publicReview: Locul este potrivit pentru liniste si relaxare. Usor de ajuns la locatie si ai la Ã®ndemÃ¢nÄƒ tot ceea ce ai nevoie. Recomand!

Bogdan is an excellent host, proactive and very responsive. The mountain family chalet has 3 bedrooms and 1.5 baths, has a large refrigerator, a freezer and a BBQ. The pictures represent the chalet very well. We checked in late and Bogdan had a a neighbor help us find the chalet and get in. To get to the chalet, drive uphill from the main road on an asphalted road for about 6 minutes. Park next to the chalet and walk down stone steps. It is better not to have heavy luggage. The garden is nice. We had a slight issue with the hot water for the shower but was manageable. The super automatic coffee machine that has coffee beans is a nice touch. Overall, a very nice mountain chalet with a very responsive host.

Bohdan's house is perfect, we had a great stay in a house that had all the amenities, fully equipped kitchen, very comfortable living room and bedrooms, perfect outdoors and bbq, the garden was very kind friendly, overall a great and peaceful place. Bogdan is very responsive and helpful host, gave us good recommendations and places to see.

Am petrecut un weekend minunat in locatia lui Bogdan! Casuta e izolata, inconjurata de natura si liniste, perfecta pentru un weekend departe de galagia orasului. Bogdan a fost foarte receptiv cu orice am avut nevoie, am avut o comunicare foarte buna. Cu siguranta vom reveni!

Our stay at Bogdanâ€™s house was truly exceptional! No photo or description can fully capture how amazing this place really is. The house is not only beautiful but also feels warm and welcoming, with every detail thoughtfully arranged, from the cozy ski-themed decorations to the spacious garden and play area, which our daughter loved exploring. It was the perfect spot for our family to relax, enjoy barbecues, and feel at home while being close to Sinaia, BraÈ™ov, and the surrounding mountains for our daily adventures. Bogdan was a wonderful host: attentive, kind, and always ready to help. We couldnâ€™t have asked for a better stay and would wholeheartedly recommend this house to anyone looking for a peaceful and unforgettable experience in the area. Thank you, Bogdan, for making our Romania trip so special! Valeria

We spent 2.5 weeks in Bogdan's place with our two kids (9 and 6), and our vacation was everything we wanted and needed it to be. The house fit our needs perfectly: beautiful, quiet, comfortable, private, plenty of extra linens, clean, tons of outdoor space and activities for kids (and adults who want a nap in a hammock). Bogdan was a truly outstanding host: he responded almost immediately to every question we had, with recommendations about local activities and services, quick response to a small electric problem in the house, and really gave the impression that he takes his responsibility as a host very seriously, while being both friendly and professional. As a bonus, there are endless opportunities for playing hide-and-seek around the property :) We really can't recommend this place enough!! Your public reply Thank you Sylvie for your kind and appreciative words. It was a pleasure, and for me it's always a pleasure to see people enjoying a place I built initially for my family and for my kids. Now they are big, they are not playing hide and seek around anymore, but I'm happy to see the place provides the same joy for other kids now :) Delete Edit Private note from Sylvie Bogdan, We wanted to thank you again personally, beyond our public review, for your amazing hospitality. The house was exactly what we needed and was perfect for our kids, for our style of vacation (nature, away from the crowds). Everything about the property was meticulous and professional and as we wrote in the review, we also could tell that you really care about your guests and their experience. We arrived home feeling relaxed and awake, like we were finally breathing freely again. Thank you for everything!! Sylvie, Isaac, Idit, and Boaz Kedem

Everything is great! An excellent choice for those who want to relax in nature with beautiful views! The house has everything you need for a comfortable stay! The territory is large and cozy, with the possibility of barbecue or just relaxing!

Great looking chalet in a private area of Comarnic, far from the busy main road. The place was very welcoming, with a tranquil long garden and spacious rooms. Bogdan was always available to answer any queries. Recommended for both a summer or winter break.

Everything was great! The house is very clean and cozy! Beautiful private territory with perfect views of the mountains and nature! Away from the city noise. There is a lot of space outside for both barbecue and for children (swings, hammocks, sun loungers)! In this place you can really relax and reboot! One of the best places in this region! Bogdan is kindly ready to help with any questions! I highly recommend for a family vacation in nature!

Absolutelly beatiful, very quiet and large garden with a barbecue place and a playground for kids. The garden is in the back of the house and you can't hear any noise from the street, only the birds. In one morning we were visited by a cute squirrel :) Inside the house you have everything you need for cooking, TV with Netflix, boardgames and a kids room. Overall, everything was great!

We had a wonderful stay at Bogdan's lovely house, located high up with mountain views. Nice walks can be had locally and many sights are just a short drive away. The house is very well equipped with everything you could possibly need and more. Full kitchen, decent entertainment system, comfy beds, cosy frontroom/diner, nice selection of board games, books (including local guidebooks and maps), fast wifi. The house is tastefully decorated and very clean. There is a large garden with fun things for the kids, fire pit and outside cooking facilities (was too cold for us to get full use - must go back in the summer!). As a host, Bogdan is very attentive with excellent communication and is there if you need anything. We couldn't recommend this listing enough!
Casa este perfecta pentru adulÈ›i È™i copii
Perfect place for a city brake , we recommend it , we keep coming back here regularly now

Bogdan's house was absolutely wonderful and exactly as described, clean, secluded with a lovely view and great for kids. Bogdan himself was a great host, responded very quickly and provided everything needed. I will definitely recommend the place to friends.
Beautiful spacious house with everything you would need and a great view. I would definitely recommend to stay here if you want to explore the area from a peaceful place.

Foarte linistit, casa curata si spatioasa. In curte sunt leagane, balansoar si o tiroliana mica, foarte dragut. Recomand cu drag

Cabana asta e un soi de acasa departe de casa! Este locul perfect pentru cateva zile petrecute cu familia. Nu iti va lipsi nimic, ba chiar o sa ai si lucruri extra: un catel prin curte, o priveliste ce te linisteste si daca ai noroc si cateva veverite alergand de colo-colo. Noi ne-am simtit tare bine si vom reveni cu drag! :)

We stayed at Bogdan's place for a month. Incredible experience - the place is cozy, quiet, with a big private backyard. Perfect to escape from the city routine and noise. I worked remotely, the Wi-Fi was good on the 1st floor. We had a car parked outside, no problems with that either. The BBQ place and the indoor fireplace are well-made, I enjoyed chopping wood logs and making a fire. There are a couple of big supermarkets 10 mins to drive, a couple of restaurants with delivery, and a bar across the street with some basic food like bread, sweets, etc. The neighbors were friendly, and Bogdan was responsive, guiding us through our stay. Warm memories were created :) Your public reply Iâ€™ m very happy you enjoyed the stay Oleksandr! Hope to have the chance to meet you in person next time! Delete Edit Private note from Oleksandr Thank you for hosting us, we hope to come back next year :) Wish you well!

Wat een geweldig verblijf was dit! Een prachtig huis op een adembenemende plek. Een enorm grote privÃ©tuin met een geweldig uitzicht. Alles was aanwezig in het huis. We konden niks meer wensen dan dit. Bogdan reageerde heel snel, was behulpzaam en altijd bereikbaar! Nogmaals een geweldig verblijf, die ik iedereen kan aanbevelen .

Bonita casa con todo los necesario para sentirte como en casa. SofÃ¡ enorme y magnÃ­fica cafetera... Gran terraza para disfrutar de las vistas. Rodeada de naturaleza y muy buena situaciÃ³n para visitar RumanÃ­a (Rasnov, Bucaresta, Sinaia, Sibiu....) y para hacer senderismo, etc... El anfitriÃ³n siempre nos respondiÃ³ rÃ¡pido y un pequeÃ±o problema que tuvimos se solucionÃ³ enseguida.
Am revenit cu placere, ne-am simtit ca acasa.

Amazing spot for a peaceful retreat with family & friends! Bogdan's place has everything we looked for & more. The garden is amazing, lots of trees and plants plus heaps of amnesties for kids. The ski-themed house is very cozy lots of cool decorations and very well equipped. Bogdan's communication was impecable & proactive. We'll definetly comeback when we'll want to cool off and relax.

It was one of the few places where it felt like home! It is a very private house, surrounded by nature! Very clean and very spacious, lots of space for the kids to play! Everything was handy, barbecue and kitchen well equipped! I loved how the house was built and the terrace offered great place to drink your coffee!! The host was very friendly and responsive to all the questions we had!! Thank you for a beautiful experience!!

Der Garten ist leider sehr abschÃ¼ssig und fÃ¼r kleine Kinder ungeeignet - auch wegen der vielen Steintreppen. So konnten wir unsere Kinder (1, 3) keinen einzigen Moment unbeabsichtigt lassen. publicReview: This place is perfection! Feeling like in a real mountain chalet while still being in Subcarpati. there is plenty of room outside and the house is clean and with all amenities needed. the guest is amazing! we have a 3 years old kid and he helped us to have everything prepared for him before coming, even buying a bed for him on this purpose. the communication was great as well, and Bogdan is a very proactive person. If you look for calm, nature, some animals touch do not hesitate and book it. i will definetly get back when in Romania. Your public reply Thanks Larisa for your kind words. It was a pleasure, I hope to see you back soon! Delete Edit Private note from Larisa multumesc pentru tot. a fost perfect!

Bogdanâ€™s mountain chalet was one of the most enjoyable Airbnbs I have stayed in. Beautiful house in a stunning location. So much to do within a short drive. Bogdan was always responsive and very helpful. I look forward to returning!

Awesome, cozy and relaxing cabin! The place had everything we needed and was very clean. Additionally the cabin is very nicely decorated and is very spacious. We were only two there but it has a lot of space and amenities if you want to go with friends or family. Also the back yard is big and itâ€™s a perfect place to relax, look at the sky and listen to the birds. You can have breakfast at the table in the yard looking at the sunrise, or watch the sunset from the swing outside. It was very warm and cozy and it offers also some entertainment options like board games, chess or a nice TV. Regarding the host: very friendly and responsive and he gave us some nice tips about what to do in the surrounding area. We went for some short hikes around the cabin, with some nice views. The check in and check out were very smooth and Bogdan was very attentive to give us a good experience.
Bogdan ha sido muy agradable, habrÃ­a que mejorar un poco la accesibilidad a la casa a pesar de que se avise en la bienvenida,. es muy acogedora la casa muy bien caldeada, muy completa y limpia
Great place , great location, unbelievable privacy ğŸ˜Š, we looking forward for our next brake ğŸ˜Š

Casuta este un colt de rai. Atent, cu gust si cu umor decorata, cu atentie la detalii, ofera absolut tot ce am avut nevoie - o familie de 2 adulti si 2 adolescenti, timp de o saptamana. Nu a lipsit absolut nimic, ba chiar am fost surprinsi foarte placut de mici detalii de confort: de la boxa de pe terasa, la cutia cu chibrituri de langa gratar, la sertarele din bucatarie cu toate cele necesare. Comunicarea a fost perfecta, Bogdan a ajutat prietenos si prompt inclusiv cu recomandari de plimbari in natura in imprejurimiri. Zona este foarte linistita, privelistea minunata, ne-am simtit foarte bine si sigur vom reveni cat de curand. Multumim, din suflet!
Absolutely a lovely place, we enjoy everything there ğŸ˜Šso we recommend the place
I was out second time here and everthing was perfect, we plan to come back in the summer.
Great place to go, meditate, stay bythe fire and enjoy a family weekend out

Bogdan was a super responsive and warm host as was the housekeeper who met us on arrival and departure. The house itself is well-located (1.5-2 hours away from Bucharest), extremely clean, spacious and has everything you need to cozy up for the weekend - a well stocked kitchen, comfortable beds w/ extra linens and towels, board games and a home entertainment system. The sofa could be a bit more comfortable but this is very, very minor in comparison to everything else this listing has to offer. We'll definitely be back!

Am petrecut un weekend relaxant cu prietenii in cabana lui Bogdan, casa este bine amenajata, primitoare si foarte bine echipata. Am apreciat in primul rand semineul si livingul luminos. Planuim deja sa revenim.
ğŸ’—

Ne-am dorit cateva zile de liniste, relaxare si intimitate si am gasit locul perfect pentru asta. Casa este foarte curata, frumos amenajata si primitoare, are tot ce trebuie. Este situata sus, in zona de sat si case de vacanta. Gazda prompta, comunicarea excelenta, ne-a raspuns solicitarilor. Cararea de la drum la casa este amenajata si destul de usor de coborat/urcat. Citind alte recenzii ma asteptam la traseu montan :). Am fost toamna, sfarsit de octombrie, peisaj minunat. Am testat si lucrul remote, reteaua sustine un utilizator in videocalluri dar fara alti consumatori mari de internet (netflix, telefoane, etc). Dorim sa revenim pe viitor, am mai fi stat daca nu aveam alte obligatii.
Bogan was a great host, we definitely recommend staying here.

Loved it. I was there with my husband and our 6 month old baby and it was exactly what we needed, quiet place in the nature with lots of things to do (indoor and outdoor). Bogdan was very easy to reach and helpful with any request or question we've had. Highly recommend him and the place.
Great place, awesome house. Amazing view and great garden for outdoors lovers. Highly recommend.

Ãˆ stato un soggiorno meraviglioso, abbiamo passato due settimane immersi nella natura senza rinunciare a tutti i comfort. La casa all'interno Ã¨ veramente ben progettata, letti comodi, sempre acqua calda, cucina attrezzata e due bagni sono utilissimi. Lo spazio esterno Ã¨ da sogno, sia la terrazza dove si mangia che il giardino sono meravigliosi, la zona barbecue Ã¨ comodissima e ci si diverte tantissimo con le altalene e gli slides messi da Bogdan. Per i bambini Ã¨ divertimento puro, e nelle giornate piovose ci sono tanti giochi anche all interno, sia per i piccoli che per i grandi! Per non parlare della TV con Netflix ed HBO si una sera ci si vuole anche guardare una serie o un bel film...Bogdan Ã¨ sempre super disponibile ci ha consigliato ristoranti e hikings da fare nelle vicinanze, ottimi consigli! Che dire, grazie di tutto e spero a presto!
Big house with a rally big yard. Both old and modern, quite and peaceful but also very comfortable with everything we needed and more. Wish we could stay longer.

We stayed at Bogdan's house for 7 days, two parents and an 18-year-old girl and we enjoyed every moment. The house is spacious, comfortable and has everything you need for a relaxing stay. The yard is wonderful and usually quiet, and it's great to sit there in the shade or in the sun as you choose, eat on the balcony and just stare at the green landscape. Even on very hot days it was pleasant and a light breeze blew, and the house itself remained relatively cool. The location is great, close to many beautiful nature areas, lakes, scenic roads and hikes, and also very close (10 minutes by car) to the supermarket and everything you need for a long stay. Bogdan was communicative and available, solved every problem and helped with every question we had. Highly recommended place!
Super miejsce dla duÅ¼ej rodziny! Klimatycznie urzÄ…dzony dom, super wyposaÅ¼ony! Bardzo dobry kontakt z Bogdanem. Bardzo polecamy i mamy nadziejÄ™, Å¼e jeszcze kiedyÅ› tam wrÃ³cimy :)

We always come back to Bogdan's place because it is exactly what we need: easy to reach, a short drive from Bucharest, but still away from the hustle and bustle and surrounded by beautiful landscape. The locations is perfect for a weekend getaway or a longer stay, it has all the amenities you need. Bogdan was amazing as always, responsive and eager to help. We are already planning our next visit!
Very nice place to stay. It has a cozy atmosphere and is very welcoming

Bogdanâ€™s house is a gem! We travelled with our little ones and we felt like home. Very nicely designed house with attention to details, big yard with trees, swings and grill, we even made the first very small fire camp for the kids. The house has everything you need plus more. If you want a nice cozy house and peace an quiet throughout the day then this is the house you want to be in. Great work, Bogdan, for what the house offers and for your services! Your public reply Thanks a lot Adina, it was a real pleasure! I hope you'll come back soon (I'll consider all your suggestions by then!) Delete Edit Private note from Adina Casa este excelenta, ne am simtit minunat, copiii in delir ğŸ™‚ Singurul lucru care mi-ar fi placut ar fi fost sa fie mai cald in casa, eu sunt mai friguroasa si imi place (mai ales la munte) sa fie warm & toasty. Oricum, minunata casa. Multumim!

Beautiful property close to Bucharest, which offers stunning views of nature. It's equipped with everything you need for a great stay - we initially wanted to hike & visit more, but decided to relax on the property instead. Thank you!

An incredible place. So spacious and comfy. Short drive from the popular but beautiful Bucegi National Park with its endless trekking possibilities. It's very nice that this house is higher up, far from the touristic centre. Also the Piatra Craiului National Park isn't too far and very very beautiful. Very well equipped, super super comfortable place which is tastefully decorated by a ski lover. Very homy and comfortable. You don't see neighbours. In a cute little village. Bogdan is a great guy. Very helpful but discreet. Communication very good, everything very good. Highly recommended, we hope to get back soon. Thank you Bogdan!

We had a very nice stay in Comarnic at Bogdan's place, far from the sweltering heat of Bucharest. The chalet is spacious, very well furnished and decorated in good taste, and has everything a couple or even two families need. We spent a few very relaxing evenings on the swing bench overlooking the backyard / garden, which is large and green and is surrounded by tall trees which keep shade throughout most of the day. Overall a great experience for me and my wife, and we will want to come back whenever possible.
We had a lovely stay. Thank you!
Great place , great location and great host.
Private , quiet and all the things you need for a relaxing vacation. Bogdan assured that we have everything we need. Within minutes from some very nice trails you can do in an afternoon.

The place is wonderful, trees everywhere and everything that surrounds you is green.We found delicious wild strawberries in our garden. We loved the ski theme pictures on the walls and also loved the stickers which reminded me of a ski rent shop.Everything is so clean and perfectly arranged.You got pretty much all you need.We wished we could have stayed longer :D Our girls loved the toys in the kids room and also the nest swing in the garden.Neighbours are very friendly and kind, they gave us on our request, raw cow milk and rasberry jam. If you want a great, fun and totally relaxing vacation this is definetly a very good option! Thank you Bogdan for everything and we hope to get back soon!
Everything was very incredible. The host was very kind

we had the most welcoming stay in this â€œheaven-likeâ€ place! the cabbin is sparkling clean, fully equipped and very cosy. the backyard is generous and private from any neighbors and has a spectacular view of the area. I strongly recommend this cabin if you want an intimate retreat in the area!

The house it self from one side has almost everything, specially for kids (toys and etc) . But the house it self doesn't taken care of as should. Smell of sewer everytime you use water , there was a leak and the host didn't tell us. And another very important detail from the road to the house 100 m steep slope , very hard to take the lagguge to the house specially if you have a stroller and small children , the garden near the house also a steep slope so children can't play there

Recomand cu caldura aceasta cazare. Ne-am simtit foarte bine, la fel si bebelusul de 9 luni. Conditiile sunt foarte bune, iar peisajul este foarte frumos. Planuim sa ne intoarcem pentru un interval mai lung de timp.
Superba privelistea!
Top
Gazda super si locatie excelenta daca iti doresti o vacanta linistita si cat mai aproape de natura. Ne-am simtit minunat si am avut o comunicare foarte buna cu gazda.

We saw a deer, a squirrel and a bunch of different birds just sitting in the rocking chair in the yard. Also sun bathed 4 hours every day at the end of October, pretty cool. Inside is spacious & well equipped. It was as warm as we wanted it to be and superconfortable. No faults what so ever. Good to know: from where you will leave the car to the chalet you have a slope (a rough guess: around 100m, 15 degrees). Also pictures shown for the chalet include an extra small wooden house (similar to a tree house), that was actually taken down.

Weâ€™ve had a fair share of magical stays with airbnb and Bogdanâ€™s house tops the list from afar. Placed in a fully Ã©dÃ©nique green yard, it offered us a complete home experience for what was our longest time away. The house is even more beautiful than it looks in the photos, is warm, comfortable and fully equipped for both short and long stays. We loved the fresh air, the snow in the winter - the backyard perfect for our son, the sound of birds in the spring and in the summer, and absolutely adored the sound and the look of the sheep in the morning and in the evening in the spring walking by our charming houseâ€¦ Bogdan is a very responsible and responsive host and heâ€™s been there for us whenever we needed it. It remains in our hearts as our second home and weâ€™ll be happy to return on occasions.
O locuinta foarte bine dotata si foarte primitoare, te simti exact ca la tine acasa. O zona foarte frumoasa si o casa curata.

We had a great time at Bogdan's place and an easy check in and check out experience. Beautiful cottage, sparkling clean, amazing fireplace, good amneties, perfect view and friendly neighbours. Great for a retreat vacation, very close to Bucharest. Our one year old enjoied watching the squirls and the birds. We enjoied barbequing and swinging in the yard. We will surely come back. It's one of the most beautiful places we've staid trough Airbnb.
Quiet isolated place

The perfect place to enjoy nature and relax! The house is located in a stunning location, we couldn't get enough of the backyard view that overlooks the valley, we were surrounded by nature and we enjoyed watching the birds and squirrels in the trees, and barbecuing. The interior is very spacious, sparkling clean and with all the amenities one would need for an extended stay. The heating system kept us warm and cozy during the colder nights. Bogdan was extremely responsive, helping us with every inquiry we had and making us feel very welcomed. Highly recommended, we will definitely be coming back!

Bogdan's place is really a wonderful retreat, if you are looking for silence and relaxation. The back yard is amazing and the view is so great that you have the feeling you are in the middle of the woods. The house is equipped with everything you might need and even more. It was a real pleasure to stay there, for sure we will be back soon.

We had a wonderful stay at Bogdan. He is an awesome host and his place is amazing. The house is sparkling clean and very cozy. Our favorite activity was to stay in the morning in the yard, enjoy our coffee and watch the squirrels play in the trees. I highly recommend Bogdans` place if you want a peaceful and relaxing vacation and in touch with nature.

We spent almost all summer 2020 at Comarnic Family Chalet and it proved to be one of the best summers ever, especially given the "Covid" circumstances: the chalet is more than fit for a family with children, has all necessary amenities to make you feel at home and all this is completed by a large courtyard, fresh air, calm and peace and overwhelming views of the Bucegi mountains at only 10 min walk. We enjoyed all this whilst being also able to work from home, thanks to the powerful internet connection. Access is extremely easy and it spares visitors from most of the crowded week end roads from Valea Prahovei, as it is well placed in an area from Comarnic just before the jam zones. We intend to return here and warmly recommend this location to anyone who wants to spend a relaxing and calm time in the mountains. Thank you, Bogdan!
A wonderful place to relax and enjoy nature.

This place is amazing, the best Airbnb we ever stayed. The house itself is very cute, everything well laid out and working, a comfortable place to be whatever the weather. Itâ€™s also full of little touches that show you it has been Bogdanâ€™s passion, not just a property. The setting is also fabulous, some distance from the road and surrounded by trees and plants, we saw squirrels, hedgehogs, a fox, and many, many different kinds of birds. The terrace overlooks the valley with distant forested hills and mountains in the background. Bogdan was an excellent host, dealing with the few problems we had fast and efficiently, he also left a wonderful basket filled with local foods, eggs, cheese and glorious tomatoes. I would highly recommend this house to anyone, we stayed an entire month and could easily have stayed more.

The house is great, tastefully decorated, spacious and clean. You will find what the pictures show. Bogdan is a very responsive and welcoming host. Highly appreciated his implication and fast answers. The breakfast Basket was beautiful, filled with delicious local products: eggs, cheese, milk, fruits and vegetables. The location is beautiful, litterally in the middle of nature but this comes for a cost as access can be quite challenging for those travelling with kids or lots of luggage. From the main road, where you can leave the car, there is quite a steep path down that leads to the house. It is not unduable for grown-ups, but kids might get upset, especiallt if you do it several times a day. Mine cried to be carried all the way up which was not an easy job. All in all it is a beautiful stay if you come prepared or donâ€™t mind a bit of efort. Your public reply Thanks Manuela, it was a pleasure for me too!... I have some plans for improving the path down and make it more enjoyable for the little ones. So, if you'll come back in September your kids will have a better experience, I promise! Delete Edit Private note from Manuela Multumim pentru tot, Bogdan! Am scris in review despre accesul la casuta, poate il descrieti un pic mai clar ca sa setati asteptarile corect mai ales pentru parinti :) A fost singurul lucru major pe care l-as avea de sugerat. Am mai punctat cateva detalii pe care le-as adresa pentru cei care vin cu copii. Casa si zona sunt minunate. Multumim pentru ospitalitate.
We had a great time at Bogdan's place. Really nice house, lots of space, big yard with BBQ.
